title: Heritage Connector Sample Query
body:
PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/>
SELECT ?label (COUNT(?label) as ?count) WHERE{?s sdo:isPartOf ?label.} GROUP BY ?label ORDER BY DESC(?count)

title: Get people/organisations/objects with a link to Wikidata
body:
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> 
 PREFIX wdt:  <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct/> 
 PREFIX wd:  <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/> 
 PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> 
 PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#> 
 
 SELECT ?item ?itemLabel ?wdItem ?wdItemlabel WHERE { 
   ?item skos:hasTopConcept 'PERSON'. 
   ?item owl:sameAs ?wdItem. 
   ?item rdfs:label ?itemLabel. 
   
   SERVICE <https://query.wikidata.org/sparql> { 
     ?wdItem rdfs:label ?wdItemlabel. 
     FILTER(LANG(?wdItemlabel) = "en"). 
   }  
 } LIMIT 100
